title: While playing Yasuo, I noticed something about my playstyle and attitude
body:
If I'm thinking about making plays, I often screw up and die, then get humiliated by my peers. I get frustrated and keep doing worse.

If I just play, I end up doing things that I don't realize are impressive until a teammate or the enemy points it out, often enthusiastically. If I keep just thinking about the beat of my music or some such thing, I tend to keep doing incredible things.
